text: Ke tapa'ile tiniharula'i dekhanu bha'ena? Jasale davi ta gardachan ki juna (granthaharu) tapa'ila'i pradana gari'eko cha ra juna granthaharu tapa'ibhanda pahila utari'eka thi'e ti sabaima tinale imana rakhdachan tara vastavama tiniharule aphna vivadaka kuraharu nisaphako lagi allaha baheka an'yatira lagna cahanchan, jabaki tinala'i adesa gari'eko thiyo ki saitanala'i visvasa nagarun ra saitanale cahancha ki tinala'i sahi margabata vicalita gara'ihalos
